accountError.title: Entered incorrect login information.
accountError.contents: Account info does not exist. Please check the email address and password and try again.

securityError.title: Account security
securityError.contents:
If the password is inputted incorrectly more than 5 times, the account will be converted to a locked account for account security. To unlock the account, you must reset your password to log in.

Password Error : {n} times

lockedError.title: Locked account notice
lockedError.contents: Abnormal activity has been detected and your account was locked. Please reset your password.
